mapper.insert: INSERT INTO musicstory(userId, division, subject,subcontent, content, imageFilename) VALUES( #{userId}, #{division}, #{subject},#{subcontent},#{content}, #{imageFilename})
mapper.update: UPDATE musicstory SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select: SELECT num,userId,subject,subcontent,division,content,DATE_FORMAT(created,'%Y-%m-%d')created,imageFilename FROM musicstory ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10;
